dean_cain.orientation:
Welcome {name},

Look we'll cut to the chase, the only way this university stays open is if Sonic wins us a championship but he's a lazy irresponsible jerk so you need to figure out how to get him to the stadium, otherwise we're all screwed.

No one's been able to do this yet so you'll need to talk to other students, check out the campus, find whatever you can that might help. But on the plus side if it works out you'll know your way around!

Stay Gold,
Dean Cain
